info.name: Instawell API
info.description:
The Instawell API gives you access to  helpers all over the world. Integrate Instawell with your app using our API to get help wherever you are. Follow the instructions below to get started.

Base URL
----
The Instawell API supports a sandbox mode by making API calls to our sandbox server. Using the Sandbox server, you can make sure your integrations are working before deploying them to production. 

Sandbox mode is accessed by using the following base URL

~~~~
https://api-sandbox.instawell.com/
~~~~

Production mode is acccessed by using the following base URL

~~~~
https://api.instawell.com/
~~~~


Get your Access Token
-----

The token to access the Team API is available when you create your first Team. Have a look at the Create Team method to find out how to do this.

Most requests made to the Instawell API require the auth token to be sent as part of the header. Exceptions will be noted in the docs. The name of the header to be used is X-instawell-token

~~~~
X-instawell-token: TEST_TOKEN
~~~~

Once you have your token, you're ready to go.

request.description:
Use this method to find available Plans on Instawell. Use the `category` field to filter Plans by Category. 

Calling this method without the `category` field will return the possible Category values. 

Possible category values are : mentalhealth, relationships

response.name: Example Response for Finding Plans

formdata.description: Required. The ID of the Plan that you want to chat about.
Required. The ID of your Team.

request.description:
Once you've found a Plan you like, you can make a request for it. When you make a request for it, we notify the Helper who created the Plan that there's someone waiting to chat with them. And you can start chatting with them as soon as they accept the request. 

The response to this method also contains a link you can use to automatically login to your account.

response.name: Example Response for Requesting a Plan

formdata.description: Required. The ID of the Plan that you want to chat about.
Email is a required field if you do not have an auth token. An account will automatically be created for your use.
The name of the Team
What type of Team do you have? Valid values are COMPANY, SCHOOL, NONPROFIT
The number of people in your Team
Get a custom subdomain for your Team. e.g. team-name.instawell.com

request.description:
Create a new Team for an existing user or for a new user. 

If you are a new user and you want to create a Team, simply supply the email as a parameter in the body and an account will be automatically created for you. 

*The response will also return a an `auth_token` that you can use in subsequent requests.*

If you are an existing user and you want to create a new Team under your existing account, then simply add the `X-instawell-token` header in the request to do this.

response.name: Example Response for Creating a Team

formdata.description: Email is a required field if you do not have an auth token. An account will automatically be created for your use.

A URL pointing to an image to be used as the background of your Team.

A URL pointing to a square image used as the Team's logo.
Update the custom URL for your Team

request.description: Use this method to retrieve information about the Team. We return basic information like name, description and image used as well as other meta information.

response.name: Example Response for Getting a Team

request.description:
This is a Premium Team method.

Returns all the members that are a part of this Team.

response.name: Example Response for Getting Team Members

request.description:
This is a Premium Team method.

This method returns information about your Team's wallet balance.

response.name: Example Response for Get Team Wallet

request.description:
This is a Premium Team method.

You can use this method to  retrieve some basic stats about your Team. We currently return the following information

- users_joined : How many members joined the Team
- users_invited : How many members have been invited
- wallet_balance : Current wallet balance (in USD) for this team
- money_spent : How much money was spent on the Team by users.
- plans_sold : The number of Plans that have been sold on this Team
- plans_trialed : The number of Plans that have been trialed on this Team

response.name: Example Response for Get Team Stats

request.description:
This is a Premium Team method.

The widget code is some HTML that will allow you to embed an Instawell widget on your own website. The widget points to your Team and allows visitors to interact with your Team right from your own website. 

To include the widget on your website, simply copy the `embed_html` field from the response and paste it at the bottom of your website template.

response.name: Example Response for Get Team Widget

request.description:
This is a Premium Team method.

Use this method to retrieve the most recent notifications for your Team.

response.name: Example Response for Get Team Notifications
